title: Arunachal Pradesh signs MoA with THDCIL for 1200 MW Kalai-II hydroelectric project
description: The Chief Minister Pema Khandu thanked the Prime Minister Narendra Modi and the Union Power Minister R. K. Singh for unflinching support towards restarting the project. He expressed that the state is committed to ensuring full development of the hydropower potential for meeting the energy security of the country and asked all the stakeholders to implement the project in a mission mode.
